Release Notes

1.1.0 - 2023-TODO

  1. Added the "Reactor Components" navigation module.
  2. Added all available themes.
  3. Added options to choose from all available themes to the demo app.
  4. Added more components to the demo app.
  5. The KoliBriCDN component is now dependent on the KoliBriCodiconCDN.

1.0.0 - 2023-08-18

First baselined version
